mapper.insert: insert into bb_viewedby (created, destGuid, modified, version, viewedByType, user_guid, guid) values (#{created,jdbcType=DATE}, #{destGuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modified,jdbcType=DATE}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{viewedByType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user.guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select count(*) from bb_viewedby where destGuid = #{value}
select distinct * from bb_viewedby where destGuid = #{value} order by created desc
